title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin gives you three star NBA players you need to build around: Giannis Antetokounmpo, Luka Doncic, and Jayson Tatum. Chris Paul hasn't won a title because of two things. Kevin Durant is starting to hold Kyrie Irving accountable for his actions, the Lakers have trapped themselves with Russell Westbrook, and Colin gives you his Post Draft / Post Schedule NFL Predictions.

 

Guest: Stephen Jackson

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
